greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of Bernoulli numbers interleaved with even numbers.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Bernoulli Number
formula: a(n) divides A057643(n). _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 03 2012
mathematica: a[n_]:=If[OddQ[n], n+1, BernoulliB[n] // Denominator]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 60}](* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 29 2012 *)
program: (MAGMA) [IsEven(n) select Denominator(Bernoulli(n)) else n+1: n in [0..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 08 2017
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Aug 08 2009
